overview: Deng Chu, a middle aged famous football club player, is dismissed from the club after losing consecutively on the field. To lift his mood, he decides to take the whole family for a trip. The family gets in a car accident on the way, Deng Chu blaming himself for his children's and wife's death goes to atone his sins in his wife's hometown in order to take care of his in-laws.
title: Never Walk Alone
